concept.title: Transformation Scenarios
concept.shortdesc: After creating a map, you can transform your content into several outputs.

conbody.p: The two most common transformation scenarios include PDFs and WebHelp deliverables. You can add filters to a transformation in order to exclude information on a deliverable for one user, while still keeping the content there in case you need to include that information on a deliverable for a different user. The following topics will provide instructions on how to add filters during a transformation scenario, and how to create a PDF or WebHelp responsive from a LwDITA map.
